title: Sample Book, ca. 1857
medium:
Medium: cardboard, paper, cotton
Technique: printed
dimensions: H x W x D: 44 x 28 x 12 cm (17 5/16 in. x 11 in. x 4 3/4 in.)
description: Green cloth bound volume of 1,823 samples of printed cottons mounted on paper. Title page marked "A1857." Many samples of miniature geometric and floral patterns and combinations of both forms. Larger pattern with border designs and warp stripes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, ca. 1857.
ca. 1857. Medium: cardboard, paper, cotton
Technique: printed. Gift of Virginia Hamill Johnson. 1973-6-1.
